solution_line_template: First find the total cook time for the steaks: {num_steaks} steaks * {steak_time} minutes/steak = <<{num_steaks}*{steak_time}={total_steak_time}>>{total_steak_time} minutes
Then add the waffles' cook time to find the total cook time: {total_steak_time} minutes + {waffle_time} minutes = <<{total_steak_time}+{waffle_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
